name: js-rest-spa
description: * start from the up-to-date main branch (`git checkout main; git pull origin main`) * Create a feature branch named 'js-rest-spa' (`git checkout -b js-rest-spa`) * modify the files in this directory to have the require features * add, commit, and push the branch to github * Create a PR to merge to main * Be sure to include the TA(s) and I as reviewers.   * Due by **Sun Mar 27 11:59pm (PT)**
author: Soumya Nayar <nayar.s@northeastern.edu>
